1.0.0.name: wordpress/content-pizazz
1.0.0.description:
Content Pizazz is a plugin that provides the user with a number of shortcodes for enhancing their posts and content:

1) Gradient Buttons - Linkable buttons that look great.
2) 3D Buttons - Linkable buttons using the new CSS3 rules.
3) Columns - Shortcodes for 1/4, 1/3, 1/2,3/3 and 3/4 columns that can be used in a defined width
    to create a custom column layout.
4) Quotes - Quote shortcodes that add a large quote image for your quote, in a left or 
    right sided section, or accross the page.
5) Lists - 9 list images that can be nested up to 3 times, that add pizazz to your list items.
6) Drop Caps - A nice effect, make the first letter of a section or paragraph a very big size.
7) Special Text - Let's you change the color and size of a section of text.
